description: Deku Babas could be bred to eject their spiny teeth from a distance. As with most Babas, their teeth could grow back in a matter of hours.
tooltip: Deku Babas could be bred to eject their spiny teeth from a distance. As with most Babas, their teeth could grow back in a matter of hours. (Allows Deku Babas to grow Projectile Teeth, giving them a ranged attack)
